Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the entire 82nd Airborne division has not been deployed to the U.S.-Mexico border.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the 82nd Airborne received word they are being deployed, when in reality only the 2nd Assault Helicopter Battalion was sent.
Understate: There is no evidence of understating in the claim.
Falters at times: The claim does not falter at times.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide specific evidence or sources.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the deployment of the 82nd Airborne is directly related to the migrant caravan, which may not be the case.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not provide alternative explanations for the deployment of the 82nd Airborne.
